# iosxr_aaa_authorization (Data Source)

This data source can read the AAA Authorization configuration.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "iosxr_aaa_authorization" "example" {
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `device` (String) A device name from the provider configuration.

### Read-Only

- `commands` (Attributes List) List name for AAA authorization (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--commands))
- `eventmanager` (Attributes List) List name for AAA authorization (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--eventmanager))
- `exec` (Attributes List) List name for AAA authorization (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--exec))
- `id` (String) The path of the retrieved object.
- `network` (Attributes List) List name for AAA authorization (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--network))

<a id="nestedatt--commands"></a>
### Nested Schema for `commands`

Read-Only:

- `a1_group` (String) server-group name
- `a1_local` (Boolean) Use local password for authorization
- `a1_none` (Boolean) no authorization
- `a1_tacacs` (Boolean) Use list of all TACACS+ hosts
- `a2_group` (String) server-group name
- `a2_local` (Boolean) Use local password for authorization
- `a2_none` (Boolean) no authorization
- `a2_tacacs` (Boolean) Use list of all TACACS+ hosts
- `a3_group` (String) server-group name
- `a3_local` (Boolean) Use local password for authorization
- `a3_none` (Boolean) no authorization
- `a3_tacacs` (Boolean) Use list of all TACACS+ hosts
- `a4_group` (String) server-group name
- `a4_local` (Boolean) Use local password for authorization
- `a4_none` (Boolean) no authorization
- `a4_tacacs` (Boolean) Use list of all TACACS+ hosts
- `list` (String) List name for AAA authorization
